CHART_DATE, A.BOD AS CURR_BOD, B.BOD AS CHART_BOD, A.COD AS CURR_COD, B.COD AS CHART_COD, A.SS AS CURR_SS, B.SS AS CHART_SS, A.TN AS CURR_TN, B.TN AS CHART_TN, A.TP AS CURR_TP, B.TP AS CHART_TP, A.PH RANK () OVER ( PARTITION BY A.FACT_CODE, A.WAST_NO ORDER BY WMCYMD DESC) RN, A.FACT_CODE AS PT_NO /* 사업장코드 */ , B.FACT_NAME AS PT_NM /* 사업장명 */ , A.WAST_NO /* 방류구번호 */ , FACT_KIND_NAME /* 시설구분 */ , FACT_CAPACITY /* 처리용량 */ , SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || '.' || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) || '.' || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 7, 2) AS WMCYMD /* 조사년도 */ , A.BOD /* BOD (㎎/L) */ , A.COD /* COD (㎎/L) */ , A.SS /* SS (㎎/L) */ , A.TN /* T-N (㎎/L) */ , A.TP /* T-P (㎎/L) */ , A.PH /* PH */ , A.FLW /* 적산유량(평균) (㎥/HOUR) */ , A.TOC /* 총유기탄소 (㎎/L) */ , F.DO_NM /* 시도 - 히든 */ , F.CTY_NM /* 시군구 - 히든 */ , F.DONG_NM /* 읍면동 - 히든 */ , F.RI_NM /* 동리 - 히든 */ , E.WS_NM /* 대권역 - 히든 */ , E.AM_NM /* 중권역 - 히든 */ , E.AS_NM /* 소권역 - 히든 */ FROM (SELECT FACT_CODE, WAST_NO, BASE_TIME AS WMCYMD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'BOD00', HOUR_VL)) AS BOD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'COD00', HOUR_VL)) AS COD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'SUS00', HOUR_VL)) AS SS, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TON00', HOUR_VL)) AS TN, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TOP00', HOUR_VL)) AS TP, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'PHY00', HOUR_VL)) AS PH, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'FLW01', HOUR_VL)) AS FLW, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TOC00', HOUR_VL)) AS TOC FROM TMS_HOURDATA GROUP BY FACT_CODE, WAST_NO, BASE_TIME) A, WTMSC_FACT B, WTMSC_FACT_KIND C, WTMSC_FACT_WAST_TEMP D, (SELECT DISTINCT ADM_CD, WS_NM, AM_NM, AS_NM FROM KESTI_WATER_ALL_MAP) E, COM_DISTRICT_RAW F WHERE A.FACT_CODE = B.FACT_CODE AND B.FACT_KIND = C.FACT_KIND AND A.FACT_CODE = D.FACT_CODE AND A.WAST_NO = D.WAST_NO AND SUBSTR (D.ADM_CD, 1, 10) = E.ADM_CD AND E.ADM_CD = F.ADM_CD AND SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) >= #{startYear} || #{startMonth} AND SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) <= #{endYear} || #{endMonth} AND A.FACT_CODE IN #{item} ) A, (SELECT RANK () OVER ( PARTITION BY A.FACT_CODE, A.WAST_NO ORDER BY WMCYMD DESC) RN, A.FACT_CODE AS PT_NO /* 사업장코드 */ , B.FACT_NAME AS PT_NM /* 사업장명 */ , A.WAST_NO /* 방류구번호 */ , FACT_KIND_NAME /* 시설구분 */ , FACT_CAPACITY /* 처리용량 */ , SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || '.' || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) || '.' || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 7, 2) AS WMCYMD /* 조사년도 */ , A.BOD /* BOD (㎎/L) */ , A.COD /* COD (㎎/L) */ , A.SS /* SS (㎎/L) */ , A.TN /* T-N (㎎/L) */ , A.TP /* T-P (㎎/L) */ , A.PH /* PH */ , A.FLW /* 적산유량(평균) (㎥/HOUR) */ , A.TOC /* 총유기탄소 (㎎/L) */ , F.DO_NM /* 시도 - 히든 */ , F.CTY_NM /* 시군구 - 히든 */ , F.DONG_NM /* 읍면동 - 히든 */ , F.RI_NM /* 동리 - 히든 */ , E.WS_NM /* 대권역 - 히든 */ , E.AM_NM /* 중권역 - 히든 */ , E.AS_NM /* 소권역 - 히든 */ FROM (SELECT FACT_CODE, WAST_NO, BASE_TIME AS WMCYMD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'BOD00', HOUR_VL)) AS BOD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'COD00', HOUR_VL)) AS COD, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'SUS00', HOUR_VL)) AS SS, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TON00', HOUR_VL)) AS TN, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TOP00', HOUR_VL)) AS TP, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'PHY00', HOUR_VL)) AS PH, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'FLW01', HOUR_VL)) AS FLW, MAX(DECODE (ITEM_CODE, 'TOC00', HOUR_VL)) AS TOC FROM TMS_HOURDATA GROUP BY FACT_CODE, WAST_NO, BASE_TIME) A, WTMSC_FACT B, WTMSC_FACT_KIND C, WTMSC_FACT_WAST_TEMP D, (SELECT DISTINCT ADM_CD, WS_NM, AM_NM, AS_NM FROM KESTI_WATER_ALL_MAP) E, COM_DISTRICT_RAW F WHERE A.FACT_CODE = B.FACT_CODE AND B.FACT_KIND = C.FACT_KIND AND A.FACT_CODE = D.FACT_CODE AND A.WAST_NO = D.WAST_NO AND SUBSTR (D.ADM_CD, 1, 10) = E.ADM_CD AND E.ADM_CD = F.ADM_CD AND SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) >= TO_CHAR ( TO_DATE (#{startYear} || #{startMonth}, 'YYYYMM') - 30, 'YYYYMM') AND SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 1, 4) || SUBSTR (A.WMCYMD, 5, 2) <= #{endYear} || #{endMonth} AND A.FACT_CODE IN #{item} ) B WHERE A.PT_NO = B.PT_NO AND A.WAST_NO = B.WAST_NO AND B.RN BETWEEN A.RN AND A.RN + 4 ORDER BY A.PT_NO, A.WAST_NO, A.RN, B.RN DESC ) GROUP BY RN , WS_NM ,AM_NM ,AS_NM ,PT_NM ,WAST_NO ,FACT_KIND_NAME ,FACT_CAPACITY ,WMCYMD #{startYear}||#{startMonth} AND SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (A.ymdh, 'YYYYMMDDHH24'), 1, 6) <= #{endYear}||#{endMonth} AND A.WLOBSCD IN #{item} GROUP BY SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (YMDH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24'), 1, 8), A.WLOBSCD, OBSNM) A, KESTI_WATER_ALL_MAP B, COM_DISTRICT_RAW C WHERE A.ADM_CD = B.ADM_CD AND A.ADM_CD = C.ADM_CD) A, (SELECT RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY WLOBSCD ORDER BY WLOBSCD, WMCYMD DESC)AS RN, SUBSTR #{item} AND SUBSTR(TM, 1, 6) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startYear} || #{startMonth}, 'YYYYMM') - 35,'YYYYMM') AND SUBSTR(TM, 1, 6) <= #{endYear} || #{endMonth} AND B.OBSTCD = '2' GROUP BY STNID, OBSNM, 측정값(유해남조류세포수) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_MCYST_LR,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_MCYST_LR),',','') AS ITEM_MCYST_LR /* 측정값(마이크로시스틴-LR) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_GEOSMIN,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_GEOSMIN),',','') AS ITEM_GEOSMIN /* 측정값(지오스민) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_2MIB,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_2MIB),',','') AS ITEM_2MIB /* 측정값(2MIB) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_PH,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_PH),',','') AS ITEM_PH /* PH */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_DOC,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_DOC),',','') AS ITEM_DOC /* DO */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY),',','') AS ITEM_TRANSPARENCY /* 투명도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY),',','') AS ITEM_TURBIDITY /* 탁도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS /* 측정값(남조류 Microcystis) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA /* 남조류 Anabaena */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA /* 남조류 Osillatoria */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON /* 남조류 Aphanizomenon */ FROM AG_RWMDTI_DAY_V_C_KRF ARD /* 친수활동구간 */ ) A WHERE PT_NO IN #{item} /* 지점코드 */ AND WMYR||WMOD BETWEEN #{startYear} || #{startMonth} AND #{endYear} || #{endMonth} /* 시작일자 및 종료일자 */ ) A , ( SELECT Rank () OVER ( partition BY A.PT_NO ORDER BY wmcymd DESC) RN /* 순번 */ , A.* FROM ( SELECT ARD.PT_NO /* 지점코드 */ ,ARD.PT_NM /* 지점명 */ ,ARD.WMYR /* 조사년도 */ ,ARD.WMOD /* 조사월 */ ,WMCYMD /* 채수년월일 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TEMP,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TEMP),',','') AS ITEM_TEMP /* 측정값(수온) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_SURFACE_CLOA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_SURFACE_CLOA),',','') AS ITEM_SURFACE_CLOA /* 측정값(클로로필-a) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE),',','') AS ITEM_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE /* 측정값(유해남조류세포수) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_MCYST_LR,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_MCYST_LR),',','') AS ITEM_MCYST_LR /* 측정값(마이크로시스틴-LR) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_GEOSMIN,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_GEOSMIN),',','') AS ITEM_GEOSMIN /* 측정값(지오스민) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_2MIB,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_2MIB),',','') AS ITEM_2MIB /* 측정값(2MIB) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_PH,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_PH),',','') AS ITEM_PH /* PH */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_DOC,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_DOC),',','') AS ITEM_DOC /* DO */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY),',','') AS ITEM_TRANSPARENCY /* 투명도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY),',','') AS ITEM_TURBIDITY /* 탁도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS /* 측정값(남조류 Microcystis) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA /* 남조류 Anabaena */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA /* 남조류 Osillatoria */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON /* 남조류 Aphanizomenon */ FROM AG_RWMDTI_DAY_V_KRF ARD /* 상수원구간 */ UNION SELECT ARD.PT_NO /* 지점코드 */ ,ARD.PT_NM /* 지점명 */ ,ARD.WMYR /* 조사년도 */ ,ARD.WMOD /* 조사월 */ ,WMCYMD /* 채수년월일 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TEMP,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TEMP),',','') AS ITEM_TEMP /* 측정값(수온) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_CLOA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_CLOA),',','') AS ITEM_AVERAGE_CLOA /* 측정값(클로로필-a) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE),',','') AS ITEM_BLUE_GREEN_ALGAE /* 측정값(유해남조류세포수) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_MCYST_LR,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_MCYST_LR),',','') AS ITEM_MCYST_LR /* 측정값(마이크로시스틴-LR) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_GEOSMIN,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_GEOSMIN),',','') AS ITEM_GEOSMIN /* 측정값(지오스민) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_2MIB,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_AVERAGE_2MIB),',','') AS ITEM_2MIB /* 측정값(2MIB) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_PH,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_PH),',','') AS ITEM_PH /* PH */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_DOC,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_DOC),',','') AS ITEM_DOC /* DO */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TRANSPARENCY),',','') AS ITEM_TRANSPARENCY /* 투명도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_TURBIDITY),',','') AS ITEM_TURBIDITY /* 탁도 */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS /* 측정값(남조류 Microcystis) */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA /* 남조류 Anabaena */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA /* 남조류 Osillatoria */ ,REPLACE(DECODE(ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON,'',' ',ARD.ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON),',','') AS ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON /* 남조류 Aphanizomenon */ FROM AG_RWMDTI_DAY_V_C_KRF ARD /* 친수활동구간 */ ) A WHERE PT_NO IN #{item} /* 지점코드 */ AND WMYR||WMOD <= #{endYear} || #{endMonth} /* 시작일자 및 종료일자 */ ) B WHERE A.PT_NO = B.PT_NO AND B.RN BETWEEN A.RN AND A.RN + 4 ORDER BY A.PT_NO, A.RN, B.RN DESC )GROUP BY RN ,PT_NO ,PT_NM ,CURR_WMCYMD ,CURR_ITEM_TEMP ,CURR_ITEM_CLOA ,CURR_ITEM_BL_GR_ALGAE ,CURR_ITEM_MCYST_LR ,CURR_ITEM_GEOSMIN ,CURR_ITEM_2MIB ,CURR_ITEM_PH ,CURR_ITEM_DOC ,CURR_ITEM_TRANSPARENCY ,CURR_ITEM_TURBIDITY ,CURR_ITEM_BGA_MICROCYSTIS ,CURR_ITEM_BGA_ANABAENA ,CURR_ITEM_BGA_OSILLATORIA ,CURR_ITEM_BGA_APHANIZOMENON

WITH POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL AS (SELECT WS_CD, SW_CODE, ADM_CD, NO, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, DO_NM || ' ' || CTY_NM || ' ' || DONG_NM || ' ' || RI_NM AS ADDR, PERCENTAGE, GUBUN, GNR_BOD_SUM, GNR_TN_SUM, GNR_TP_SUM, OUT_BOD_SUM, OUT_TN_SUM, OUT_TP_SUM FROM (SELECT '1' AS NO, '소계' AS GUBUN, WS_NM, WS_CD, AM_NM, AM_CD, SW_NAME, SW_CODE, DO_NM, CTY_NM, DONG_NM, RI_NM, ADM_CD, CAT_DID, '' AS PERCENTAGE, GNR_BOD_SUM, GNR_TN_SUM, GNR_TP_SUM, OUT_BOD_SUM, OUT_TN_SUM, OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT) WHERE CAT_DID IN #{item} ORDER BY WS_CD, SW_CODE, CAT_DID, ADM_CD, NO) SELECT WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, GUBUN, GNR_BOD_SUM, GNR_TN_SUM, GNR_TP_SUM, OUT_BOD_SUM, OUT_TN_SUM, OUT_TP_SUM FROM (SELECT '1' AS NO_1, NO AS NO_2, '' AS WS_CD, '' AS SW_CODE, '' AS WS_NM, '' AS AM_NM, '총계' AS SW_NAME, '' AS CAT_DID, GUBUN, SUM(GNR_BOD_SUM) AS GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_TN_SUM) AS GNR_TN_SUM, SUM(GNR_TP_SUM) AS GNR_TP_SUM, SUM(OUT_BOD_SUM) AS OUT_BOD_SUM, SUM(OUT_TN_SUM) AS OUT_TN_SUM, SUM(OUT_TP_SUM) AS OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY GUBUN, NO UNION SELECT '2', NO, WS_CD, SW_CODE, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, GUBUN, SUM(GNR_BOD_SUM) AS GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_TN_SUM) AS GNR_TN_SUM, SUM(GNR_TP_SUM) AS GNR_TP_SUM, SUM(OUT_BOD_SUM) AS OUT_BOD_SUM, SUM(OUT_TN_SUM) AS OUT_TN_SUM, SUM(OUT_TP_SUM) AS OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL GROUP BY NO, WS_CD, SW_CODE, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, GUBUN) ORDER BY NO_1, WS_CD, SW_CODE, NO_2

WITH POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL AS (SELECT WS_CD, SW_CODE, ADM_CD, NO, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, DO_NM || ' ' || CTY_NM || ' ' || DONG_NM || ' ' || RI_NM AS ADDR, PERCENTAGE, GUBUN, GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_BOD_SUM) AS GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_TN_SUM) AS GNR_TN_SUM, SUM(GNR_TP_SUM) AS GNR_TP_SUM, SUM(OUT_BOD_SUM) AS OUT_BOD_SUM, SUM(OUT_TN_SUM) AS OUT_TN_SUM, SUM(OUT_TP_SUM) AS OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY GUBUN, NO UNION SELECT '2', NO, WS_CD, SW_CODE, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, GUBUN, SUM(GNR_BOD_SUM) AS GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_TN_SUM) AS GNR_TN_SUM, SW_NAME, GUBUN) ORDER BY NO_1, WS_CD, SW_CODE, NO_2

CAT_DID, PERCENTAGE, GNR_BOD_LAND, GNR_TN_LAND, GNR_TP_LAND, OUT_BOD_LAND, OUT_TN_LAND, OUT_TP_LAND FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT UNION SELECT '6' AS NO, '양식계' AS GUBUN, WS_NM, WS_CD, AM_NM, AM_CD, SW_NAME, SW_CODE, DO_NM, CTY_NM, DONG_NM, RI_NM, ADM_CD, CAT_DID, PERCENTAGE, GNR_BOD_FISH, GNR_TN_FISH, GNR_TP_FISH, OUT_BOD_FISH, OUT_TN_FISH, OUT_TP_FISH FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT UNION SELECT '7' AS NO, '매립계' AS GUBUN, WS_NM, WS_CD, AM_NM, AM_CD, SW_NAME, SW_CODE, DO_NM, CTY_NM, DONG_NM, RI_NM, ADM_CD, CAT_DID, PERCENTAGE, GNR_BOD_LANDFILL, GNR_TN_LANDFILL, GNR_TP_LANDFILL, OUT_BOD_LANDFILL, OUT_TN_LANDFILL, OUT_TP_LANDFILL FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT) WHERE CAT_DID IN #{item} ORDER BY WS_CD, SW_CODE, CAT_DID, ADM_CD, NO) SELECT WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, ADDR, PERCENTAGE, GUBUN, GNR_BOD_SUM, GNR_TN_SUM, GNR_TP_SUM, OUT_BOD_SUM, OUT_TN_SUM, OUT_TP_SUM FROM (SELECT '1' AS NO_1, NO AS NO_2, '' AS WS_CD, '' AS SW_CODE, '' AS ADM_CD, '' AS WS_NM, '' AS AM_NM, '' AS SW_NAME, '' AS CAT_DID, '총계' AS ADDR, TO_NUMBER('') AS PERCENTAGE, GUBUN, SUM(GNR_BOD_SUM) AS GNR_BOD_SUM, SUM(GNR_TN_SUM) AS GNR_TN_SUM, SUM(GNR_TP_SUM) AS GNR_TP_SUM, SUM(OUT_BOD_SUM) AS OUT_BOD_SUM, SUM(OUT_TN_SUM) AS OUT_TN_SUM, SUM(OUT_TP_SUM) AS OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY GUBUN, NO UNION SELECT '2', A.NO, WS_CD, SW_CODE, ADM_CD, WS_NM, AM_NM, SW_NAME, CAT_DID, ADDR, PERCENTAGE, GUBUN, GNR_BOD_SUM, GNR_TN_SUM, GNR_TP_SUM, OUT_BOD_SUM, OUT_TN_SUM, OUT_TP_SUM FROM POLLULANT_LOAD_FOR_CAT_TBL A) ORDER BY NO_1, WS_CD, SW_CODE, CAT_DID, ADM_CD, NO_2

SELECT A.PT_NO AS "ptNo" , B.WMYMD AS "wmymd" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1052' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "bod" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1054' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "doc" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1049' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "cod" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1055' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "tn" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1056' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "tp" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1060' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "temp" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1039' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "ph" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1053' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "ss" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1063' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "cloa" , MAX(CASE WHEN B.ITCD = '1073' THEN WMVL ELSE NULL END) AS "toc" FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(PT_NO, 5, 1) AS GUBUN , PT_NO FROM RWMPT WHERE SUBSTR(PT_NO, 5, 1) IN ('A','B','D','E','F') UNION ALL SELECT 'G' AS GUBUN , PT_NO FROM TB_AW_PTCD_RWMPT_PTCHAR WHERE SUBSTR(PT_NO, 5, 1) IN ('A','B','D','E','F') AND PTCHAR_A = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'H' AS GUBUN , PT_NO FROM RWMPT WHERE PT_NO IN ('1007A20', '1007A27', '1007A60', '2007A25', '2009A05', '2009A30', '2011A25', '2011A55', '2014A25', '2014A70', '2020A32', '3012A07', '3012A32', '3012A42', '5004A10', '5004A35') ) A , (SELECT PT_NO, ITCD, WMVL, WMYMD FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PT_NO ORDER BY WMYMD DESC) AS RNK , A.* , B.WMYMD FROM TW_RWMDT A , (SELECT DISTINCT PT_NO, WMYR, WMOD, SUBSTR(WMWK,1,1) AS WMWK, WMYMD FROM RWMDTD ) B WHERE A.PT_NO = B.PT_NO AND A.WMYR = B.WMYR AND A.WMOD = B.WMOD AND A.WMCD = B.WMWK AND ITCD IN ('1052', '1054', '1049', '1055', '1056', '1060', '1039', '1053', '1063', '1073') AND TRIM(A.WMYR) >= '2015' ) WHERE RNK = '1' ) B WHERE A.PT_NO = B.PT_NO AND A.GUBUN = #{type} GROUP BY A.PT_NO, B.WMYMD ORDER BY "ptNo", "wmymd"
SELECT /* KRF-BIZ.SearchResultMapper.searchResult_H_getDate */ MAX(DE) AS DE FROM HSPF_MODEL_RESULT WHERE SPOT_CODE IN #{item}

SELECT /* KRF-BIZ.SearchResultMapper.searchResult_H */ REPLACE(SPOT_CODE,'Reach','RCH') as SPOT_CODE, DE, TO_CHAR(PREDICT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')||'시' AS PREDICT_DT, ROUND(BOD,1) AS BOD, ROUND(CHLA,1) AS CHLA, ROUND(DOC,1) AS DOC, ROUND(FLUX,3) AS FLUX, ROUND(WTRTP,1) AS WTRTP, ROUND(NH3,3) AS NH3, ROUND(NO3,4) AS NO3, ROUND(OP4,3) AS OP4 FROM HSPF_MODEL_RESULT WHERE SPOT_CODE IN #{item} AND REPLACE(DE,'-','') BETWEEN #{startYear} || #{startMonth} || #{startDay} AND #{endYear} || #{endMonth} || #{endDay} ORDER BY SPOT_CODE, DE DESC, PREDICT_DT ASC
